amendment.description: To require reports to the Department of Defense on penetrations of networks and information systems of certain contractors.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3280 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3280 proposed by Senator Levin. (consideration: CR S7294-7298; text: CR S7297) To require reports to the Department of Defense on penetrations of networks and information systems of certain contractors.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3280 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3280 proposed by Senator Levin.
